short_summary: Contract for the renovation of HVAC systems Phase 1 OEM Project OBJECTIVE: objective renovation and refurbishment of HVAC systems for the Life Sciences Project Procurement Planning Approval Canadian Free Trade Agreement Exhibition
description: और CONTRACT FOR DESCRIPTION AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 16, 2022 by 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
